title: My Dog
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 33 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR50L
description: The spirited little dog can run, jump, climb, roll, and even hug the boy who loves him. The dynamic text guides students through new verb vocabulary and uses repeated sentence patterns with high-frequency words.
reviewWords: climb, dig, dog, hug, jump, over, roll, run, sit, swim
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details of the text
awareness: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant sounds
wordWork: Categorize Words                : Categorize content words on a Venn diagram
